revision.comment: add missing final period (full stop) in 'From ...' line
revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== From {{confix|en|xanth|odont}}. ===Noun=== {{en-noun|!}} # {{lb|en|rare|formal|or|humorous}} A person who has [[yellow]] [[tooth|teeth]]. [[Category:English 3-syllable words]] [[Category:en:People]]
